review: I bought this just a couple of days ago. And I am beyond satisfied. The plug and play capability make it basic to use, nothing easier that I can think of. I've seen a lot of reviews from people who have haven't actually used the product. This product is hands down awesome. It's one of the best on the market. I haven't had it long but I've enjoyed every second of it. And sideloading apps are a breeze. You don't event have to root

review: The Fire Stick exceeded my expectations. Prior to buying it, I used an HDMI cable with a connector to my ipad to view Prime content. I figured the Fire Stick would eliminate wires and it did. Oh, but it did so much more!  There is a ton of content on the Fire Stick. I'm thrilled!  And kicking myself for not cancelling my exoensive cable bill sooner.
